related_questions.question:
My name is Arja. This is my family. Tonight, all the members    of the family ... (15) in
the livingroom. (16) a sport magazine. My sister, Arsy ... (17) bear doll
. My
mother (18) her tea My Daddy ... (19) hot chocolate into his cup.

 b. are gathering
 c. gather
 d. gathered

16. a. read
 b. reading
 c. is reading
 d. am reading

17. a. play
 b. plays
 c. played
 d. is playing

18. a. enjoy
 b. enjoys
 c. is enjoing
 d. am enjoying

19. a. am pouring
 b. is pouring
 c. are pouring
 d. poured
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

15. B. Are Gathering

16. D. Am Reading ( di soal tidak ada penjelasan siapa )

17. D. Is Playing

18. C. Is Enjoying

19. B. Is Pouring

related_questions.question:
Rearrange the sentences become a good dialog. *    ￼

A. 1-5-3-4-2

B. 2-5-3-4-1

C. 2-4-1-5-3

D. 1-5-2-4-3

secepatnya 

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2-4-1-5-3

Penjelasan:

2. Edo : Have you seen real monkey,Udin? i mean not on tv or in a magazine?

4. Udin : Yes,I have.

1. Edo : What are they like?

5. Udin : They're very friendly and playful.

3. Edo : Wow! That's interesting because as far as i know, not all monkeys are friendly. I want to see one too.

hope you find this helpful ^•^

related_questions.question:
44. Change the verb into the correct form!    a. She (drive) very well.
b. They (open) the store at 8:00.
c. Linda (be) a very pretty girl.​

answers.answer:
a. she drivied very well

b. they opened the store at 8:00

c. Linda being a very pretty girl.

If I woke up without ya

back

f**ks

me

care

A. He will be lazy to wake up
B. He could be single forever
C. He usually doesn't fall fast
D. He doesn't know what will he do
49. What is the only reason the girl loves the singer?
A. To take money and fame
B. To get back to her ex-lover
C. To know that he is creeping
D. To make him feel it in the air

49. D

name is Bambang and my mother's name is Alya. I live
with my family at 7 Batu Sangkar Street.
I am twelve years old. Tasya is ten years old. Bimo
is six years old. Zaky is three years old. My father is
fourty three and my mother is fourty. We are good
family
